snippet.title: Riven | Official Launch Trailer | Available NOW | 4k
snippet.description:
Riven is available worldwide NOW! 🎉

We're SO proud of this one, friends. We can't wait for you to play it! 💙
-----
Riven is available on the following storefronts ⤵️

Steam (with a limited-time 10% launch discount)⤵️ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1712350/Riven

GOG (with a limited-time 10% launch discount) ⤵️ https://gog.com/en/game/riven

Meta Quest ➡️ https://vr.meta.me/s/1THYGRhu7zLdEXP

Mac App Store ➡️ https://apps.apple.com/us/app/riven/id1437437535

-----

Stay up-to-date with the latest news and sneak peeks of Riven by following Cyan Worlds on social media:

X (Formerly Twitter): https://twitter.com/cyanworlds
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CyanGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cyanworlds/

Join the conversation on the official Cyan Discord server:
Discord: https://discord.gg/szMTWTH7Tq

Learn more: https://cyan.com/games/riven/
